BlogEntry.Title: Heh, heh, he said Fish Balls
BlogEntry.Description: Weight Watchers recipe cards from 1974. From Doc. I almost peed laughing at this.

BlogEntry.Title: What's that sucking sound?
BlogEntry.Description: I've been playing Freelancer. Look at the time of this post. The game just sucks you from one mission to another. It was hard to pull myself away even now!
